original: intros a b c d k H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7. apply Zis_gcd_unique with (c:=1) in H6. apply Zis_gcd_unique with (c:=1) in H7. destruct H6; destruct H7. - symmetry in H6; symmetry in H7. apply rel_prime_bezout in H6. apply rel_prime_bezout in H7. apply Bezout_intro in H6. apply Bezout_intro in H7. omega. - destruct H7. apply rel_prime_mult with (c:=k) in H6. apply rel_prime_bezout in H6. omega. - destruct H6. apply rel_prime_mult with (c:=k) in H7. apply rel_prime_bezout in H7. omega. - clear H H0. apply rel_prime_bezout in H6. apply rel_prime_bezout in H7. destruct H6, H7. apply rel_prime_cross_prod with (c:=k) in H4. apply rel_prime_cross_prod with (c:=k) in H5. destruct H4 as [H4 _]. destruct H5 as [H5 _]. rewrite H4, H5. omega.
